  <block type="function_definition" x="-1107" y="-1071">
    <mutation name="原地右转" functionid="TD9N`?0HCsE4j;p#,2;U"></mutation>
    <field name="function_title">函数</field>
    <field name="function_name">原地右转</field>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="robotbit_motor_dual">
        <field name="motor1">makerobo.Motors.Left</field>
        <field name="motor2">makerobo.Motors.Right</field>
        <value name="speed1">
          <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
            <mutation min="-255" max="255" label="Speed1"></mutation>
            <field name="SLIDER">150</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <value name="speed2">
          <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
            <mutation min="-255" max="255" label="Speed2"></mutation>
            <field name="SLIDER">-150</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
